name: Killer Plants
description:
My final project for my Game Design II class. You are stranded on a planet full of killer plants. The plants used to grow by starlight, but one day the stars fell out of the sky. Without the stars' light, the plants began emitting toxic spores and turned evil. Only you can help find the stars and return them to the Plant God to restore peace on their planet.

Music:

"Grunge Bot" by Eric Matyas

"The Creeping Blob" by Eric Matyas

"Urban Jungle" by Eric Matyas

Assets:

Skybox add-on - Eclypso

Cartoon FX free - Jean Moreno (JMO)

CastlePack_3D environment - Kinitia Studios

Street Bench - Pixel Studios

TinyFire VFX 1.0 - Twelve

Low Poly Tree Pack - BrokenVector
